itemInfo.itemDesc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and Birch Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Birch Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Birch Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Plywood Hardener
item.desc: A material used to strengthen Plywood through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained using Alchemy.

item.name: Fishing Boat Prow
item.desc:
A prow that can be attached to a fishing boat. It allows the boat to sail faster when equipped. 
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Fishing Boat
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Fishing Boat Cargo Container
item.desc:
A freight chest that can be attached to a fishing boat. It allows the boat to hold heavier cargo when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Fishing Boat
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Calpheon Handcrafted Bed
item.desc: A handcrafted bed from Calpheon.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: Calpheon Handcrafted Sofa
item.desc: A handcrafted sofa from Calpheon.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.name: [Jukebox] Prayer of Time
item.desc: A juke box that plays the Prayer of Time theme song.
